. The bus ride is a very pleasant part of a visit to the town, in its own right.

. Unsurprisingly the Ria is less visited by tourists and less built up than the rias of Pontevedra and Vigo. Some guidebooks reckon it second only to

Like many places around it, Muros is a great place for seafood--try to take advantage, even if it's only something to eat while waiting for the bus.
